title: Potential difference across system of capacitors

content.description: Refer to the system of six 2-microfarad capacitors shown below.
content.question: What potential difference must be applied between points ùëã and ùëå so that the charge on each plate of each capacitor will have magnitude 6 microcoulombs?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
